title: Customizable Health Dashboards for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a customizable health dashboard that allows me to track my clients' health metrics in real-time, so that I can efficiently manage their care and ensure their well-being without compromising their privacy.

title: Integrated Calendar for Medication and Appointment Reminders
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want an integrated calendar that allows me to set medication and appointment reminders for each client so that I can efficiently manage care schedules and ensure timely medication administration without overwhelming my clients with alerts.

title: Personalized Health Insights – Alerts for Potential Health Risks Based on Patterns
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive personalized health alerts based on monitored trends so that I can ensure timely and accurate interventions without overwhelming my clients with unnecessary notifications.

title: Emergency Response Features – Immediate Alerts to Caregivers During Critical Events
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want immediate alerts for critical health events so that I can ensure timely interventions without compromising my clients' privacy and well-being.

title: Medication Management System – Tracking of Medication Adherence with Alerts
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to track my clients' medication adherence with alerts so that I can ensure they are taking their medications correctly while maintaining their privacy and reducing unnecessary stress.

title: Access to Caregiver Training Resources
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want access to a library of training videos and guides so that I can effectively use ALFRED to monitor my clients' health, communicate with their families, and manage their care schedules without causing confusion or stress for my clients.

title: Multi-User Access Management - Customizable Permissions for Data Access
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to customize data access permissions for each client so that I can ensure their privacy while still being able to effectively monitor their health and communicate with their families.

title: Customizable Alert Settings for Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to customize alert settings for my clients' health conditions so that I can ensure timely interventions without causing unnecessary stress or confusion for my clients.
